pages.text: $(thing)Blue and White Porcelain$() tools and weapons are made by combining $(bold)golden items$() with $(item)Blue and White Porcelain Piece$().$(br)$(thing)Blue and White Porcelain$() items have superior mining speed and damage, but are extremely brittle.
$(item)Blue and White Porcelain Piece$() can be acquired as a rare drop when breaking $(bold)Blue and White Porcelain$() blocks with a tool without $(thing)Silk Touch$().
